original_text: At Sinai mountain many years ago, God's voice caused the earth to shake. But now God has promised this: ‘Once again I will cause the earth to shake. But this time I will also cause heaven to shake.’ At Sinai mountain many years ago, God's voice caused the earth to shake. But now God has promised this: ‘Once again I will cause the earth to shake. But this time I will also cause heaven to shake.’
korean_text: 그 때에는 그 소리가 땅을 진동하였거니와 이제는 약속하여 이르시되 내가 또 한 번 땅만 아니라 하늘도 진동하리라 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: At Sinai mountain many years ago,
God's voice caused the earth to shake.
But now God has promised this:
‘Once again I will cause the earth to shake.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 다시 한번 땅을 흔들 것이다.

sentences.original_text: But this time I will also cause heaven to shake.’

sentences.original_text: But this time I will also cause heaven to shake.’
